name: Richard Galapate | Digital Storytelling - Bitsy Game
name_original: Richard Galapate | Digital Storytelling - Bitsy Game
description:
Richard Galapate | Digital Storytelling - Bitsy Game is an adventure game developed by Bath Spa University RAK. It came out on 06-01-2021.
You can play Richard Galapate | Digital Storytelling - Bitsy Game on Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
